title: Moderna and J&J Covid-19 Boosters, Mixing and Matching Authorized by the FDA
sub_head: The extra doses are expected to become available in coming days, once the CDC offers guidance on usage
body:
U.S. health regulators significantly widened the nationâ€™s Covid-19 booster campaign, clearing use of extra doses of Moderna Inc. and Johnson & Johnson vaccines and also saying people can get a shot that is different from what they had previously received.
The moves, announced by the Food and Drug Administration on Wednesday, will make boosters available to the majority of adults who have been fully vaccinated and have passed the recommended waiting period.
